Sinopse: Stories of drama (not horror or sci fi, as you make think from the previous Plot Description), that vaguely over lap into one another. An animal dies & a woman grieves. A man is interviewed by a reporter. Some kids play computer games. A group rehearse a song. A man goes to the house of a man he met in a Bar, to party with his friends. A family have a house intruder. A man stabs a rabbit. That's pretty much it, in a nutshell. It's a Drama.—keirondarbyshire
